Expected an integer.","msg_clear_all":"All user data purged. Refresh the app to take effect.","msg_export_settings_succ":"Settings exported. Check browser downloads for exported file.","typ_category_appearance":"Appearance","lbl_lang":"Language","typ_lang_helper":"Controls current display language.","lbl_assistance_grid":"Show assistance grid in the background","lbl_grid_line_thickness":"Assistance grid line thickness","typ_grid_line_thickness_helper":"Controls thickness of assistance grid line.","lbl_color_enabled":"Color cell background according to current color scheme","lbl_color_scheme":"Color scheme","typ_color_scheme_helper":"Controls current color scheme.","typ_category_gameplay":"Gameplay","lbl_game_map":"Game map layout","typ_game_map_helper":"Controls current in-game periodic table layout.","lbl_update_interval":"Update interval","typ_update_interval_helper":"Controls the interval between two game ticks.","typ_category_control":"Control","lbl_swipe_threshold":"Swipe duration threshold","typ_swipe_threshold_helper":"Controls the minimal duration above which a dragging is considered a swipe.","lbl_swipe_delta_x":"Swipe horizontal offset threshold","typ_swipe_delta_x_helper":"Controls the minimal horizontal offset above which a dragging is considered a swipe.","lbl_swipe_delta_y":"Swipe vertical offset threshold","typ_swipe_delta_y_helper":"Controls the minimal vertical offset above which a dragging is considered a swipe.","lbl_press_threshold":"Press duration threshold","typ_press_threshold_helper":"Controls the minimal duration above which a tapping is considered a long press.","typ_category_misc":"Other","lbl_concurrency":"Concurrency","typ_concurrency_helper":"Controls the maximum number of Web Workers allowed to spawn. Set to '0' to decide based on hardware. A higher value often means quicker game preparation, but a value too large may render the app unresponsive.","lbl_export_settings":"EXPORT CONFIGURATION","typ_export_settings_helper":"Save app configuration to a JSON file.","lbl_clear_all":"CLEAR ALL DATA","typ_clear_all_helper":"Delete all saved settings and progress, then reset the app to default."}
